name: Just Josh
description:
JUST JOSH
By: The Florida Big Boys

Just Josh was made for the 2018 Global Game Jam Nashville site. It was going to be a puzzle game but we ran out of time.

You can pick up stuff and use it to interact with other stuff. The NPC can sort of be interacted with.

CREDITS

Charlotte Taff: 3D item art
Cory Martin: Environment art, programming
Dana Gallant: Character art, programming
Drew Swisher: Music, SFX
Justin Espedal: Lead programming
